name: Male RPG Sprite Jumbo Pack
description:
This pack contains 10 unique male sprite sheets with 10 different colours! It also comes with the Aseprite files if you would like to edit any of the sprites.

Colours included:

- Black

- Blue

- Gray

- Green

- Orange

- Pink

- Purple

- Red

- White

- Yellow

Once you buy the pack, you can use the pack in commercial games, royalty free :)

Female Pack coming soon!
